created_at.description: ISO 8601 formatted date-time indicating when the resource was created.

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 formatted date-time indicating when the resource was updated.

start_time.description: ISO 8601 formatted date-time indicating the start time.

end_time.description: ISO 8601 formatted date-time indicating the end time.

status.description: Indicates the status of the report, which is updated asynchronously.

report_url.description: The URL where the report content, when generated, will be published to.
